00063         function confirmDelete(e) {
00064                 file_id = $(this).val();
00065                 //alert("alert - " + e.pageX + ' ' + e.pageY + ' val=' . e.target);
00066                 $( "#dialog-confirm" ).dialog({
00067                         resizable: false,
00068                         height:200,
00069                         modal: true,
00070                         buttons: {
00071                                 Cancel: function() {
00072                                         //alert("Ok - Leaving it alone");
00073                                         $( this ).dialog( "close" );
00074                                 },
00075                                 "Delete?": function() {
00076                                         //alert("file_id="+file_id);
00077                                         href_url = "delete/"+file_id;
00078                                         $( this ).dialog( "close" );
00079                                         //alert("Deleting File using url: " + href_url);
00080                                         window.location.href=href_url;
00081                                 }
00082                         }
00083                 });
00084         }
